entries.title: Mountain Lion Attacks Small Child, Mother Saves Him
entries.description: On Tuesday, a five-year-old boy was attacked by a mountain lion in northern California when his mother stepped in to save him. entries.title: Agencies, Congress Didn’t Even Try To Stop Fraud In $4T Coronavirus Bailout, Audit Finds
entries.description: In a searing, comprehensive report, the nonpartisan auditing arm of Congress excoriated the administration of almost every pandemic-era spending program—and Congress itself—for doling out $4.6 trillion with the prospect of fraud seemingly an afterthought.

entries.title: ‘Dr. Phil’ Show Will End After 21 Seasons

entries.title: First Time In 50,000 Years: Rare Green Comet Appearing To Earth Tonight
entries.description: For the first time in roughly 50,000 years, back in the Neanderthal Age, a rare green comet will be seen from Earth as it hurtles through space orbiting the sun on Wednesday night. About 26.4 million miles from Earth, Comet C/2022 E3, which was discovered last March by astronomers at Caltech’s Palomar Observatory in San ...

entries.description: A North Dakota mayor has moved to block approval of a Chinese-owned corn mill in his town after the Air Force warned that it could potentially be a national security threat.  Grand Forks Mayor Brandon Bochenski, a Republican and former NHL player, said with the city council’s approval, he would block the opening of the ...

entries.title: ‘Dances With Wolves’ Actor Arrested For Allegedly Running Sex Cult

entries.description: FBI agents searched President Joe Biden’s home in Rehoboth Beach, Delaware, on Wednesday, expanding their hunt for classified documents.
